name: AHFCA
description:
A game made for AntonJam, being a western-themed sideways shoot-em-up. With plenty of original enemies, what's there not to enjoy.

This game is also like super short, so.

Controls:

Z to fire.

Up and down arrows to move.

Try to have fun.

OH, P.S., don't press Space too much. Only press it when the game tells you to.
